entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:39 a.m. PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 6:00 AM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 8

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local smoke. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 9 May 2023
